resources.string: \"A healthy habit improving platform designed for everyone in order to motivate them for a better lifestyle by gamifying them through tailored challenges in a unique way \"

Our app needs access to some activity data in order to function in full potential, and The requested permissions include: Location, Body Temperature, Respiratory Rate, Woman\'s Health, Heart Rate, Vo2Max, Activity, Personal Information, Sleep, Nutrition, Blood Pressure, Oxygen Saturation, and Blood Glucose.
Your activity statistics can be interpreted by the coach, do you want to ask for the expert coach feedback ?
